Title: HackSC is Today!
Text: Today is the day! We can't wait to see what creativity you unleash this weekend

Title: Team Forming Workshop!
Text: "Team Matching Workshop begins now in the Fun Workshop Area!"

Title: Water Cooolers
Text: "We have water coolers in the dinner area. Please bring your water bottles to fill them up."

Title: Opening Ceremony
Text: Come to the first floor Fashion Theater for the opening ceremony!

Title: Team Matching Ceremony Pt. 2
Text: We are running it back! Come join us for a Team Matching Ceremony at 9PM

Title: API Rush is Beginning
Text: Watch the Slack and keep track of wave announcements for API rush

Title: Workshops are Starting
Text: Get hyped and head to the Main Workshop Area! Our sponsors will be giving some great tech talks over the course of the next few hours. Check the Slack + schedule for more details

Title: API Rush is Open to All
Text: Waves are over! Go out there and talk to Sponsors :)

Title: Midnight Snacks
Text: Midnight snacks are now available! Head over to the Hacker Lounge and fill your stomach up

Title: Soylent Pong?
Text: Yes, you heard that right. Soylent Pong. Now. Roll through.

Title: Breakfast!
Text: Happy Saturday morning hackers :) Check the Slack for wave announcements — it’s breakfast time!

Title: Saturday Workshops
Text: We’re kicking off our Saturday slate of workshops now! Check the live schedule to see who’s speaking

Title: PUPPIES???
Text: Yes. Fun Workshop Area. Step 1: Sign waivers. Step 2: See puppies. Step 3: ???. Step 4: PROFIT.

Title: Speed Networking Workshop!
Text: Networking but fast. Meet in the fun workshop area!

Title: Lunch Has Arrived
Text: Lunch has arrived! Check the Slack for updates and look out for your wave color

Title: Workshops Starting Again!
Text: Starting with GCP, we’ll be kicking off a new slate of workshops! Come by and learn from our awesome sponsors

Title: Dinner
Text: Dinner from Let’s Celebrate catering! Watch Slack for wave announcements

Title: Cookie Decorating!
Text: Flex your creative muscles and decorate some cookies! Meet in the Fun Workshop Area
